content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Automated cluster registration in Container Security January 31, 2025—Trend Vision One now offers automated cluster registration so that you can add many Kubernetes clusters without a repetitive installation flow. Automated cluster registration allows you to use a single Trend Vision One API Key to register all your Container Security clusters, which helps automate the deployment of Container Security protection. For more information, see Obtain an API key for automated cluster registration. Cloud Security → Container Security → Container Inventory © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: Automated cluster registration in Container Security
